text: shane_walsh Do you hear me ? No blame .
glenn_rhee What are you guys doing ? This is for geeks . Our people go over there .
daryl_dixon What 's the difference ? They 're all infected .
rick_grimes stares at a sunrise over Atlanta as he tries to reach Morgan on the walkie - talkie .

rick_grimes Morgan , I do n't know if you 're out there . I do n't know if you can hear me . Maybe you 're listening right now . I hope so . I found others . my family , if you can believe it . My wife and son , they 're alive . I wanted you to know that . There 's something else you need to know . Atlanta is n't what we thought . It 's not what they promised . The city is . Do not enter the city . It belongs to the dead now . We 're camped a few miles northwest , up by a big abandoned rock quarry . You can see it on a map . I hope you come find us . But be careful . Last night walkers came out of the woods . We lost people . Watch yourself , Morgan . Take care of your boy . I 'll try you again tomorrow at dawn andrea keeps vigil over the body of her dead sister Amy . lori comes to her .

lori_grimes Andrea . I 'm so sorry . She 's gone . You got to let us take her . We all cared about her and I promise we 'll be as gentle as we can The survivors of the attack start to clean up , burning the walker bodies and burying the dead from their group . daryl swings at dead walkers ' heads with a pickaxe as glenn and t - dog throw bodies in a fire .
rick_grimes She still wo n't move ?
lori_grimes She wo n't even talk to us . She 's been there all night . What do we do ?
shane_walsh Ca n't just leave Amy like that . We need to deal with it same as the others .
rick_grimes I 'll tell her how it is rick tries to approach andrea but she pulls a gun on him .
rick_grimes andrea .
andrea_harrison I know how the safety works .
rick_grimes All right . Okay . I 'm sorry . I 'm sorry . I 'm sorry rick backs off .
daryl_dixon Y'all ca n't be serious . Let that girl hamstring us ? The dead girl 's a time bomb .
rick_grimes What do you suggest ?
daryl_dixon Take the shot . Clean , in the brain from here . Hell , I can hit a turkey between the eyes from this distance .
lori_grimes No . For god 's sakes , let her be .
daryl_dixon Wake up , Jimbo . We 've got some work to do morales and daryl drag the body of a dead camper toward the fire .
morales Thanks . Thanks .
glenn_rhee Our people go in that row over there . We do n't burn them ! We bury them . Understand ? Our people go in that row over there daryl and morales drag the body toward the digging hole .
daryl_dixon You reap what you sow .
morales You know what ? Shut up , man .
daryl_dixon Y'all left my brother for dead . You had this coming jacqui and jim pile up bodies . jacqui notices blood on Jim 's shirt .
jacqui Are you bleeding ?
jim I just got some on me from the bodies .
jacqui That blood is fresh . Were you bit ?
jim No . I got scratched during the attack .
jacqui You got bit .
jim I 'm fine .
jacqui Then show me .
jim Do n't tell , please .
jacqui A walker got him . A walker bit jim All the guys come around him , worried .
jim I 'm okay . I 'm okay .
daryl_dixon Show it to us . Show it to us .
shane_walsh Easy , jim .
daryl_dixon Grab him jim takes the shovel on the floor .
shane_walsh Jim , put it down . Put it down t - dog catches jim back and holds him .
jim I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay daryl lifts Jim 's shirt , revealing a deep wound .
jim I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay . I 'm okay Later , the guys , lori and jacqui are talking about Jim 's case .
daryl_dixon I say we put a pickaxe in his head and the dead girl 's and be done with it .
shane_walsh Is that what you 'd want if it were you ?
daryl_dixon Yeah , and I 'd thank you while you did it .
dale_horvath I hate to say it . I never thought I would . but maybe Daryl 's right .
rick_grimes Jim 's not a monster , Dale , or some rabid dog .
dale_horvath I 'm not suggesting-- .
rick_grimes He 's sick . A sick man . We start down that road , where do we draw the line ?
daryl_dixon The line 's pretty clear . Zero tolerance for walkers , or them to be .
rick_grimes What if we can get him help ? I heard the C. D. C. was working on a cure .
shane_walsh I heard that too . Heard a lot of things before the world went to hell .
rick_grimes What if the CDC is still up and running ?
shane_walsh Man , that is a stretch right there .
rick_grimes Why ? If there 's any government left , any structure at all , they 'd protect the C. D. C. at all costs , would n't they ? I think it 's our best shot . Shelter , protection .
shane_walsh Okay , Rick , you want those things , all right ? I do too , okay ? Now if they exist , they 're at the army base . Fort Benning .
lori_grimes That 's 100 miles in the opposite direction .
shane_walsh That is right . But it 's away from the hot zone . Now listen to me . If that place is operational , it 'll be heavily armed . We 'd be safe there .
rick_grimes The military were on the front lines of this thing . They got overrun . We 've all seen that . The C. D. C. is our best choice and Jim 's only chance .
daryl_dixon You go looking for aspirin , do what you need to do . Someone needs to have some balls to take care of this damn problem !
shane_walsh Hey hey hey ! daryl heads toward jim with his pickaxe and tries to take a swing . rick points his gun at Daryl 's head .
rick_grimes We do n't kill the living .
daryl_dixon That 's funny coming from a man who just put a gun to my head .
shane_walsh We may disagree on some things , not on this . You put it down . Go on daryl puts the pickaxe down and goes away .
rick_grimes Come with me .
jim Where are you taking me ?
rick_grimes Somewhere safe rick takes jim with him . dale sits beside Andrea .
dale_horvath I came to pay my respects . Did I ever mention how I lost my wife ?
andrea_harrison Cancer , was n't it ?

dale_horvath Yeah . I dragged her to every doctor , every test . And after all the surgeries and the chemos , she was ready . She accepted it , you know ? But I never could . And I spent the last few years so angry . I felt so cheated . Since she passed , you girls were the first people . That I cared anything for . This is her birthday ?

andrea_harrison Her birthday was always like . like a week long affair . But I somehow always missed it . I was away at college or too busy for kid 's parties . She 'd call all excited . I always said that I 'd make it home and I really always meant to , but I never made it past that phone call .

dale_horvath I know things are hard enough for you without adding guilt into the mix , huh ? andrea pulls out the mermaid necklace and wraps it around Amy 's neck . Nearby , daryl continues to swing the pickaxe into dead walkers ' skulls . When he gets to Ed , carol stops him .

carol_peletier I 'll do it . He 's my husband She swings the pickaxe down on Ed 's skull repeatedly and all of her anger against her abusive husband is let loose . andrea hears Amy breathing . On the ground , Amy begins to stir . She opens her eyes .
andrea_harrison Amy . Amy , I 'm sorry Amy reaches for Andrea . Her eyes are bloodshot and she moans and paws at the air .

andrea_harrison I 'm sorry for not ever being there . I always thought there 'd be more time . I 'm here now , Amy . I 'm here . I love you She 's a walker now . andrea sobs and shoots Amy in the head . rick and shane dig graves near the campsite .
rick_grimes Say it .

shane_walsh Okay . I 'm thinking if you 'd of stayed here , if you 'd have looked after your own . Instead you went off . You took half our manpower with you . I 'm thinking maybe our losses would n't have been so bad .
rick_grimes If we had n't gone off and brought those guns back when we did , I think our losses would have been a lot worse . Maybe the entire camp The truck approaches and daryl gets out of it .
daryl_dixon I still think it 's a mistake not burning these bodies . It 's what we said we 'd do , right ? Burn 'em all , was n't that the idea ?
shane_walsh At first .
daryl_dixon The Chinaman gets all emotional , says it 's not the thing to do , we just follow him along ? These people need to know who the hell 's in charge here , what the rules are .
rick_grimes There are no rules .

lori_grimes Well , that 's a problem . We have n't had one minute to hold onto anything of our old selves . We need time to mourn and we need to bury our dead . It 's what people do In the RV , jim is lying and hallucinating . He sees zombies growling .

jim Oh no . No no no no . No , not this , please . No no no . Oh , no no no . No no The survivors stage a funeral . andrea and dale are carrying Amy 's body and putting it into a digging hole . andrea is crying .
andrea_harrison I can do it . I can do it . I can do it ! I can do it .
dale_horvath Hey The survivors are leaving the quarry to come back to the camp .
rick_grimes Burying other people is bad enough , but the thought of one of us .
lori_grimes Shh .
carl_grimes Are we safe now , dad ? Now that we 're together ?
rick_grimes I wo n't leave again . I promise you that . Not for anything . Now give me a chance to discuss some things with your mom , okay ?
carl_grimes Yeah .
rick_grimes All right . All right carl goes back to the camp . rick takes Lori 's hand .
rick_grimes shane blames me for not being here . Do you ? We got guns now . We 're stronger .

lori_grimes And we have fewer people . That makes us weaker . You want me to say I think you were right ? I understand that . All I can say is that neither one of you is entirely wrong . It 's the best I can do right now .
rick_grimes What about the CDC ?
lori_grimes Rick-- .
rick_grimes We 're at the ragged edge here . We need relief and we got a sick man who needs help . I do n't know why people ca n't see that .

lori_grimes Well , look at their faces . Look at mine . We 're all terrified . If one of us suggested , based on a hunch , that we head toward that city , you 'd have no part of it . Tell me something with certainty .
rick_grimes I love you . That 's all I got .
lori_grimes I love you too They hug . In the RV , rick and lori enter and join jim and Carol .
carol_peletier His fever is worse .
lori_grimes You need anything ?
jim Uh . Water . Could use more water .
lori_grimes I 'll get some .
jim Okay .
lori_grimes Carol , you help me ? lori and carol get out of the RV . rick sits next to Jim .
jim You save a grave for me ?
rick_grimes Nobody wants that .
jim It 's not about what you want . That , uh . that sound you hear , that 's God laughing while you make plans .
rick_grimes What I want , Jim , if . if God allows , is to get you some help jim groans and spits . jim starts being delirious .
jim Watch the mangroves . Their roots will gouge the whole boat . You know that , right ? Amy is there swimming . You 'll watch the boat , right ? You said you would .
rick_grimes I 'll watch the boat . Do n't worry .
jim Okay shane joins Lori .
shane_walsh I need you to help talk some sense into Rick . Look , this C. D. C. thing , Lori , it 's a mistake . So you 're backing him ?
lori_grimes What else would I do ? He 's my husband .
shane_walsh Look , it may be time for you to play the dutiful wife , but you ca n't tell me that fixing your marriage is worth putting people 's lives at risk .
lori_grimes I think folks around here can make up their minds without bringing my marriage into it . It 's a habit you need to break .
shane_walsh I guess I 'll just add it to the list of habits that I 'm breaking whether I like it or not rick emerges .
rick_grimes What habits ?
shane_walsh Just talking about my need for a plan , man . So what is it ? Are we leaving or not ? Maybe y' all just want to stay here . We could hang some more tin cans .
rick_grimes We ca n't stay here . We both know that .
lori_grimes I was just telling shane I think we should trust your gut .
shane_walsh Let 's go do our sweep Rick , shane and dale depart to sweep the forest for walkers .
shane_walsh Y'all keep your eyes open now . We 'll be right back While shane and t - dog drive ahead to find a replacement , rick checks on Jim , who is in agony .

shane_walsh Tell you what , man , these people , man , they 're not convinced . You know ? You head to the C. D. C , you might be on your own . You got ta really consider whether you want to put lori and carl in that kind of spot .
rick_grimes I got to do what 's best for my family .
shane_walsh Best for your family ? What 's that ? Exposing them to all kinds of risks ?
rick_grimes As opposed to what ? Crossing 100 miles of hostile territory ? If we 're looking for a lifeline , I say swim toward the closest ship , not further out to sea . Why ca n't you back me up ?
shane_walsh Look , I want to it 's just . I do n't see it .
rick_grimes If it was your family , you 'd feel differently .
shane_walsh What did you say to me ? I kept 'em safe , man . I looked after them like they were my own . That 's what I did .
rick_grimes I did n't mean it that way .
shane_walsh Well , how 'd you mean it ? Go on , man . How 'd you mean it ?
rick_grimes You 're misinterpreting me .
shane_walsh All right .
rick_grimes You 're just hearing it wrong .
shane_walsh Yeah ?

rick_grimes Look , you know . You know I can never repay that debt , okay ? A branch snaps . rick draws away . From a distance , Shane 's aim lands on Rick . Glaring , he drops the gun , then notices dale watching him .
dale_horvath Jesus shane chuckles .

shane_walsh I know . Gon na have to start wearing reflective vests out here . Seriously . Come on , man . Come on , man , let 's go . Nothing out here dale watches shane leaving , worried . Dale , rick and shane come back to the camp .

shane_walsh I 've been , uh . I 've been thinking about Rick 's plan . Now look , there are no . There are no guarantees either way . I 'll be the first one to admit that . I 've known this man a long time . I trust his instincts . I say the most important thing here is we need to stay together . So those of you that agree , we leave first thing in the morning . Okay ? At dawn , rick tries to once again reach Morgan to advise him of their plan .

rick_grimes We 're moving out , leaving the quarry . If you heard me yesterday , you may be coming here . If you are , we 'll be gone by the time you arrive . I 'm leaving a note and map behind for you taped to a red car so you can follow our trail . We 're heading to the C. D. C. If there 's anything left , it 's got to be there , do n't you think ? Morgan . I hope you were right about that place . I need you to be Suddenly , jim wakes up and coughs .

shane_walsh Everybody listen up . Those of you with C. B. s , we 're gon na be on channel 40 . Let 's keep the chatter down , okay ? Now you got a problem , do n't have a C. B , ca n't get a signal or anything at all , you 're gon na hit your horn one time . That 'll stop the caravan . Any questions ?
morales We 're , uh . we're -- we're not going .
miranda_morales We have family in Birmingham . We want to be with our people .
shane_walsh You go on your own , you wo n't have anyone to watch your back .
morales We 'll take the chance . I got to do what 's best for my family .
rick_grimes You sure ?
morales We talked about it . We 're sure .
rick_grimes All right , shane .
shane_walsh Yeah , all right .
rick_grimes . 357 ?
shane_walsh Yeah rick hands morales a gun and shane hands him ammo .
shane_walsh The box is half full .
miranda_morales Thank you all . for everything lori and miranda hug .
lori_grimes Come here .
shane_walsh Good luck , man .
morales Appreciate it .
shane_walsh Yeah eliza hugs Sophia .
eliza Bye miranda and jacqui hug . gives her doll to Sophia , who is crying .
sophia Thank you .
eliza Bye .
rick_grimes Channel 40 if you change your minds . All right ?
morales Yeah carol takes her daughter in her arms .
carol_peletier I know Morales , his wife miranda and children go away .

shane_walsh What makes you think our odds are any better ? Come on . Let 's go . Let 's move out They part ways . A note is sitting on the sports car for Morgan . dale is driving his RV , while jacqui takes care of Jim , who is in pain , and glenn is next to Dale . rick is driving a car with lori by his side , carl and sophia in the backseat , followed by Shane 's car , T - Dog 's car with Andrea , and Daryl 's car with a motorcycle on it . En route to the CDC , the RV 's radiator hose bursts .
dale_horvath I told you we 'd never get far on that hose . I said I needed the one from the cube van .
rick_grimes Can you jury - rig it ?
dale_horvath That 's all it 's been so far . It 's more duct tape than hose . And I 'm out of duct tape .
shane_walsh I see something up ahead . A gas station if we 're lucky jacqui gets out of the RV .
jacqui Y'all , Jim . It 's bad . I do n't think he can take anymore She goes back to Jim .
shane_walsh Hey , Rick , you want to hold down the fort ? I 'll drive ahead , see what I can bring back .
theodore_douglas Yeah , I 'll come along too and I 'll back you up .
rick_grimes We 'll be back on the road soon .
jim Oh no . Christ . My bones . My bones are like glass . Every little bump . God , this ride is killing me . Leave me here . I 'm done . Just leave me . I want to be with my family .
rick_grimes They 're all dead . I do n't think you know what you 're asking . The fever . You 've been delirious more often than not .
jim I know . Do n't you think I know ? groans .
jim I 'm clear now . In five minutes I may not be . Rick , I know what I 'm asking . I want this . Leave me here . Now that 's on me . Okay ? My decision . Not your failure .
rick_grimes It 's what he says he wants .
carol_peletier And he 's lucid ?
rick_grimes He seems to be . I would say yes .

dale_horvath Back in the camp when I said daryl might be right and you shut me down , you misunderstood . I would never go along with callously killing a man . I was just gon na suggest that we ask jim what he wants . And I think we have an answer .
shane_walsh We just leave him here ? We take off ? Man , I 'm not sure I could live with that .
lori_grimes It 's not your call , either one of you rick and shane carry jim to a nearby tree .
rick_grimes Yeah . That 's it jim groans .
jim Hey , another damn tree chuckles .
shane_walsh Hey , Jim . I mean , you know it does n't need to be this .
jim No . It 's good . The breeze feels nice .
shane_walsh Okay . All right .
jacqui Just close your eyes , sweetie . Do n't fight kisses him on the cheek . rick takes a gun and shows him .
rick_grimes Jim , do you want this ?
jim No . You 'll need it . I 'm okay . I 'm okay .
dale_horvath Oh . Hey . Thanks for , uh , for fighting for us .
jim Okay The group departs after making goodbye signs to Jim . Wildfire MSB3417 Active - Begin .
transmission A video monitor crackles . An unshaven man , Dr. Jenner , speaks into the camera . Dr.

edwin_jenner jenner here . It 's day 194 since wildfire was declared and 63 days since the disease abruptly went global . There 's no clinical progress to report . Item . I finally got the scrubbers in the east sector shut down to save power . Wish I could have done it a month ago , but it took me that long to figure it out . Too bad I never studied engineering . Could have saved a lot of amps . Item . I 'm still not sleeping well . Ca n't seem to keep regular hours . Living underground does n't help , not knowing if it 's day or night . I 'm just feeling very off - kilter Wildfire MSB3417 Active – End Transmission . In a biohazard suit , jenner passes through an airlock into a laboratory . He opens a tissue sample labeled TS-19 and begins an experiment . Reaching for a beaker , he accidentally knocks corrosive fluid on the tissue . An alarm sounds as jenner runs to a decontamination chamber and disrobes . Computer .

voice Alert status . Air qualifiers indicate corrosive fumes . All personnel must clear the room . Corrosive element is deemed poisonous if inhaled . All personnel clear . Full decontamination in effect From the safety of the airlock , jenner watches helplessly as the lab , and all of the remaining TS-19 samples , are engulfed in flames — an automatic safety protocol . Dr.
edwin_jenner No ! Computer .
voice Full decontamination complete Later , a drunken jenner speaks into the monitor . Dr.

edwin_jenner The TS19 samples are gone . The tragedy of their loss can not be overstat . They were our freshest samples by far . None of the other samples we gathered even came close . Those are necrotic , useless dead flesh . I do n't even know why I 'm talking to you . I bet there is n't a single son of a bitch out there still listening , is there ? Is there ? Fine . Saves me the embarrassment . I think tomorrow I 'm gon na blow my brains out . I have n't decided . But tonight , I 'm getting drunk He pours drink . Dr.
edwin_jenner Speaking of which , how far do you think I can chuck this , huh ? Pretty far I bet He throws the bottle away , shattering glass . Dr.

edwin_jenner Oh ! It is out of the stadium ! The caravan arrives outside the compound . Surrounding the building are a lot of corpses , as well as swarms of flies . Rick 's caravan approaches the CDC , where hundreds of bodies lay dead on the ground . The group quietly approaches the building .
shane_walsh All right , everybody . Keep moving . Go on . Stay quiet . Let 's go . Okay , keep moving . Stay together .
rick_grimes Keep moving . Come on .
jacqui Shh .
lori_grimes carol .
shane_walsh Shh .
glenn_rhee Oh , god Inside the CDC , Jenner 's proximity alarm sounds . Stunned , he watches the group 's approach via a security monitor . Dr.
edwin_jenner No They reach the building which is locked and shuttered .
shane_walsh Keep it together , come on .
lori_grimes We 're almost there , baby . Almost there .
shane_walsh Nothing ? shane pounds on door .
theodore_douglas There 's nobody here .
rick_grimes Then why are these shutters down ?
daryl_dixon Walkers !
lori_grimes Baby , come on daryl shoots the walker in the head .
daryl_dixon You led us into a graveyard !
shane_walsh He made a call .
daryl_dixon It was the wrong damn call !
shane_walsh Just shut up . You hear ? Shut up . Shut up ! Rick , this is a dead end .
carol_peletier Where are we gon na go ?
lori_grimes She 's right . We ca n't be here , this close to the city after dark .
shane_walsh Fort Benning , Rick -- still an option .
andrea_harrison On what ? No food , no fuel . That 's 100 miles .
glenn_rhee 125 . I checked the map .
lori_grimes Forget Fort Benning . We need answers tonight , now .
rick_grimes We 'll think of something .
shane_walsh Come on , let 's go . Let 's get out of here . Let 's go . Please rick catches sight of the security camera 's movement .
shane_walsh All right , everybody back to the cars . Let 's go . Move .
rick_grimes The camera -- it moved .
shane_walsh You imagined it .
rick_grimes It moved . It moved .
shane_walsh Rick , it is dead , man . It 's an automated device . It 's gears , okay ? They 're just winding down . Now come on Dr.
edwin_jenner No , just go away .
shane_walsh Man , just listen to me . Look around this place . It 's dead , okay ? It 's dead . You need to let it go , rick rick slams on the shutters .
lori_grimes Rick , there 's nobody here !
rick_grimes I know you 're in there . I know you can hear me shane tries to drag him away , with the help of Lori .
shane_walsh Everybody get back to the cars now !
rick_grimes Please , we 're desperate . Please help us . We have women , children , no food , hardly any gas left .
lori_grimes Rick . There 's nobody here .
rick_grimes We have nowhere else to go rick pounds on the door .
rick_grimes Keep your eyes open . If you do n't let us in , you 're killing us ! Please !
shane_walsh Come on , buddy , let 's go . Let 's go .
rick_grimes Please help us . You 're killing us ! You 're killing us ! You 're killing us ! The group is just about to leave when the door to the CDC opens , drowning the survivors in light .
